original_text: God is using his great power to keep you safe, because you trust him. He will continue to keep you safe until the last day, when Christ will return. Then you will know that God has saved you completely from sin and from death.
korean_text: 너희는 말세에 나타내기로 예비하신 구원을 얻기 위하여 믿음으로 말미암아 하나님의 능력으로 보호하심을 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: God is using his great power to keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 안전하게 지키기 위해 그의 큰 능력을 사용하고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: He will continue to keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 계속해서 당신을 안전하게 지킬 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that God has saved you completely from sin
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신을 죄로부터 완전히 구원하셨다는 것을
